title: I Have a Simulator - Novel Updates
tags: Game Elements   Non-humanoid Protagonist   System Administrator   Transported to Another World
author: 黑瞳白也
description:
Ling Ye passed through the parallel ancient world and became a sika deer in the Spring and Autumn period.

With deer body treasures, Ling Ye thought that life would continue in this manner, but he awakened the simulator, gained the power of 【Plot simulation】 and 【Nirvana】, and embarked on the road of supreme evolution.

During the Spring and Autumn period, Ling Ye fought in the field with tigers and bears, fought with humans, met the ancestors of hundreds of schools of thought, and was not afraid to face princes.

Confucius, God deer, and Kirin also exist.

According to the Warring States period, those who got the unicorn could win the world. At the beginning, the emperor pursued, but not at the end.

According to the historical records of the Han Dynasty, the unicorn came out in troubled times to pacify the world, which is why it is called the auspicious beast of heaven and earth.

The historical records of the Tang Dynasty, the immortal beast of the founding of the country, the national beast of the Tang Dynasty, Da Tang Ruixing.

In modern historical records, Kirin protects the country and the world from being invaded by wild beasts. More and more people sought it.>
